name: Patherns (paper prototype available)
description:
This game started as a DIY board game project and is now being remade as an online multiplayer free to play title. (for real)

Release

It will be released on steam and Itch.io for PC, MAC, LINUX and even maybe mobiles before 2021.

Can't wait ? Print and play the free board game prototype at home !

You can download the free paper prototype in the download section of this page.

Join our discord ! Check out the official website: https://patherns.manakeep.com/
In order for this title to become an enjoyable free multiplayer experience we need as many feedbacks as possible about the board game prototype. So please, consider checking it out.
